alert.note: Alert for Elliott; Johnson; Magoffin; Menifee; Morgan; Rowan; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 4:47PM EDT until July 18 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Morgan County in southeastern Kentucky... Northwestern Johnson County in northeastern Kentucky... Eastern Menifee County in east central Kentucky... Northwestern Magoffin County in southeastern Kentucky... Eastern Rowan County in east central Kentucky... Northern Wolfe County in southeastern Kentucky... Elliott County in east central Kentucky... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 445 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Triplett to Wagner to near Ratlitt to Red River Gorge, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Farley around 450 PM EDT. Maytown around 455 PM EDT. Pelfrey around 500 PM EDT. Henry around 505 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include West Liberty and Lenox. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Elliott; Johnson; Magoffin; Menifee; Morgan; Rowan; Wolfe
